headline: Materials and Energy Stocks Fall
summary: Materials stocks turned lower following the Federal Reserve's decision to keep interest rates steady. The S&P 500's materials sector was down 0.9% shortly after the decision that sent bond yields higher.

headline: Buy in August: PPG’s Dividend Reliability and Industrial Strength
summary: PPG Industries, Inc. (NYSE:PPG) is included among the 10 Best Dividend Stocks to Buy in August. PPG Industries, Inc. (NYSE:PPG) is an American manufacturer of paints and coatings. In May, the company announced plans to invest $380 million in a new aerospace coatings and sealants plant in Shelby, North Carolina. Construction is set to start […]

headline: Industrial Coatings Markets: Acrylic, Alkyd, Polyester, Polyurethane, Epoxy, Fluoropolymer, Solventborne Coatings, Waterborne Coatings, Powder Coatings - Global Forecast to 2030
summary: The industrial coatings market is set to surge from USD 112.04 billion in 2024 to USD 142.35 billion by 2030, driven by a 4.12% CAGR. Key growth is fueled by rising automotive production, with powder coatings rapidly expanding due to their eco-friendly nature and durability. Acrylic resin and general industrial segments retain dominant volumes, while Europe holds significant market share, propelled by its focus on sustainable technologies. headline: PPG Industries Q2 Review: Solid Margin Performance But Auto Risks Remain
summary: PPG Industries' Q2 results showed resilience in aerospace but ongoing weakness in autos and global architectural coatings. Read why PPG stock is a Hold.
